title: ORWELLIAN STATE WARNING! Meet Biden’s New 'Ministry of Truth'
description:
There's more going on with your increase in Twitter followers (and leftist decrease) than the media is letting on. We ran the numbers EXCLUSIVELY! Also, Joe Biden announced a new Ministry of Truth that should make all Americans concerned. And there's another recession coming. #Biden #Disinformation #MinistryofTruth
